data.eml:eml: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Thawthong, Anan, Hapuarachchi, Kalani K., Wen, Ting-Chi, Raspe, Olivier, Thongklang, Naritsada, Kang, Ji-Chuan, Hyde, Kevin D. (2017): Ganodermasichuanense (Ganodermataceae, Polyporales) new to Thailand. MycoKeys 22: 27-43, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/mycokeys.22.13083, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/mycokeys.22.13083
